numerologist.description: She can see the flow of power in the room... and can give it a gentle nudge if it suits her.

palmist.description: He knows what the future holds for you. Condolences.

clairvoyant.description: "I see... a family member. Let me tell them... rather, ask them what's coming."

personage.description: The spirits ask that you not look as she prepares the seance, and that you have payment on hand before we start.

glossolalist.description: Speaking from the soul comes easy when you don't have to prepare notes in any known language.

Thelemite.description: He thinks Nuit sees this all as a mockery. He's only here for the hors d'oeuvres. And perhaps to pocket a good book.

haruspex.description: "You'll take care of the washing up once we're done, won't you? Good lad."

exorcist.description: With so many accursed items going up in flames, surely nobody will notice the odd one or two missing?

demonologist.description: The mask is only a precaution; he assures you this is all perfectly safe.

thaumaturge.description: He can assure you that your blessings will be many, and for such an affordable price.

Fortean.description: "How DARE you question me? I've seen them! Seen them by the hundreds! With their eyes uncountable!"

Hermeticist.description: It takes gold to make gold.

necromancer.description: She's not much for conversation, and neither is... that?

doomsayer.description: "IT'S ALL ENDING IT'S ALL OVER OH SPIRITS PLEASE RELEASE oh yes, another sherry would be lovely thank you OH ANCIENT GODS SPARE THIS PLACE"

powerup.name: increase power
powerup.long_desc: add one point to the power of the current divination

powerdown.name: decrease power
powerdown.long_desc: remove one point from the power of the current divination

reverse.name: reverse play
reverse.long_desc: reverse the direction of turn-passing play

flip.name: reverse divination
flip.long_desc: flip the divination card to reverse its nature

setcount.name: set the countdown
setcount.long_desc: set the divination countdown to the current number of players if it is unset

summon.name: summon a spirit
summon.long_desc: play a card from the spirit deck

scholar.name: The Scholar
scholar.description: Give two times the power level in points to the terminal player.

fool.name: The Fool
fool.description: Take two times the power level in points from the terminal player.

baron.name: The Baron
baron.description: Give the power level in points to terminus-adjacent players.

pauper.name: The Pauper
pauper.description: Take the power level in points from terminus-adjacent players.

castor.name: Castor
castor.description: Give the power level in points to the player to the left from the terminal player, and take that number from the player to the right.

pollux.name: Pollux
pollux.description: Take the power level in points from the player to the left from the terminal player, and give that number to the player to the right.

gambler.name: The Gambler
gambler.description: Flip a coin. If it's heads, give twice the power level in points to the terminal player. If tails, give the power level to each adjacent.

fate.name: Fate
fate.description: The terminating player must choose another player, then flip a coin. The total point change is double the power level, and the other player gains or loses points on heads or tails respectively.

waxing.name: Waxing Crescent
waxing.description: All players but the terminal player gain a point.

waning.name: Waning Gibbous
waning.description: All players but the terminal player lose a point.
